recipes.title: Shahi Paneer
recipes.method:
Boil Onion, Cashew and tomato.
Grind them.
Put a pan/wok and add Butter.
Now add Grinded Paste into it.
Stir it for 4-5 minutes then add Masala.
Now add some water, cover the lid and cook it for 5 minutes.
After the separation of Butter from Gravy, add Paneer Cubes into the gravy.
cook it again for 10 minutes in Low flame.
Now take a ladle, put it on gas and add some butter into it after it gets hot add cumin seeds and Asafoetida and little bit masala add put it into the curry.
Now add some Coriander leavers and Roasted Cashews into it and Server.

recipes.title: Momos
recipes.method: Make a Dough.fill veggies and serve with red chutneyy and mayonnise.
